snippet.title: LOST EPIC Steam Early Access Launch! Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
◆Steam Store
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1426490/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=pv03&utm_content=en


A challenging and satisfying 2D hack and slash action
Early Access coming to you on June 5th 2021!


Gather all the strength you can, stand against the mysteries of the Sanctum---

The developers of『EARTH'S DAWN』, which has over 300,000 downloads,
brings you a new hack and slash action!

A 2D side scrolling action depicting the battle between the Gods and humans

Become the God slaying knight and battle through the world known as 「Sanctum」

日本語のPVはコチラ
URL：https://youtu.be/9jZpuZYSiuA


◆Official Website（ENG）
https://one-or-eight.co.jp/lostepic/en-us/


◆Official Twitter（ENG）
https://twitter.com/EarthWarsEN
